title: Blockchain at Berkeley
snippet: In October 2016, the Berkeley Bitcoin Association, a group of about a dozen members, founded Blockchain at Berkeley, an organization dedicated to becoming the blockchain hub of the East Bay. They also debuted the world's first undergraduate university-accredited blockchain course, Blockchain Fundamentals, taught to about 50 students.
